LanguageData.Bullet_SeoLi.label: seoli shard
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.label: shard rifle
LanguageData.YP_SeoLi.description: Compared to a conventional assault rifle, the Yunwha Precision 'Seoli(Frost)' shard rifle is equipped with a larger clip and a higher rate of fire. However, to achieve this the rifle sacrifices damage and armor piecing capability.
LanguageData.Bullet_SagPung.label: sagpung swarm
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.label: swarmer
LanguageData.YP_SagPung.description: The Yunhwa Precision 'SagPung(Boreas)' swarmer is the short range nanotech weapon. It shoots intelligent nano swarm as its bullet. Fast and incredibly accurate, it is an ideal tool for dealing with soft targets at close range.
LanguageData.Bullet_SangAe.label: sangae spike
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.label: spike rifle
LanguageData.YP_SangAe.description: Yunhwa precision's 'SangAe(Frost haze)'. Unlike more common rifles, the frost haze fires armor piercing spikes of carbon crystal.
LanguageData.Bullet_SeolHwa.label: seolhwa shard
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.label: dual wield shard pistols
LanguageData.YP_SeolHwa.description: A pair of Yunhwa Precision "SeolHwa(Snow blossom)" pistols. The SeolHwa has an extremely short range but while within close range the pistol can tear enemies to pieces.
LanguageData.Bullet_GeugGwang.label: microwave
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.label: microwave emmiter
LanguageData.YP_GeugGwang.description: Yunhwa Precision "GeugGwang(Aurora)" is a millimeter wave source that boils the water in the target's skin and thus causes incapacitating pain. It is a perfect crowd control weapon.
